pages.text: Every boss is empowered with exactly one affix item, alongside the rest of their fully enchanted gear.$(p)This affix item is guaranteed to be dropped on death, and has a higher chance to be of a higher rarity than other sources of affix loot.

This item alone is the trophy you will take from slaying a boss, and it is likely to be worth it.$(p)As a memento of the original owner, every boss item will have the boss's name prefixed to the item's name.
